page.title: 12 LAW AND ORDER
page.content: We interviewed a police constable who is a beat officer for this area. A beat officer is a policeman who works in a specific area,a "beat" getting to know the people in that area.The P.C. said that attitudes towards the police in the area seem good.He emphasized that his job would be impossible without the co-operation of the public. CRIME The police station this constable is based at is very busy.There are a large number of crimes in the area that the police station covers.The main crimes are burglaries,drug related offences (people steal to obtain money to buy drugs) and thefts from motor cars.There are more serious offences such as armed robbery.Violence is a problem.This P.C. has in his career been stabbed twice and shot.
